headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Tapestry (TPR) After A 100% One‑Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tapestry's current share price still offers value after a strong run, you are not alone. This article is designed to walk you through what that price actually implies. The stock last closed at US$133.17, with returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 7.8% over 30 days, 3.2% year to date, 100.0% over 1 year, 230.1% over 3 years and a very large gain over 5 years that is close to 4.5x. These moves have put Tapestry firmly on the radar for investors who track longer term share...
